participant_1.background:
My earliest memory is of playing in the woods behind my house.
My hair is usually auburn, but I occasionally dye it a different color to reflect my changing passions.
my passion is in programming.
I enjoy taking yoga classes and am always looking for new ways to improve my practice.
i am dissatisfied with the school life i have had so far.

participant_2.background:
My commute is the best part of my day, as I get to listen to my favorite music and think about my robotics projects.
I'm healthy because I'm responsible with my diet and I get enough sleep.
I've always loved to paint, but I don't think I could do it if I were blind.
I don't have a car, but I often bike to the basketball court.
i like fantasizing.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
Pretty good! I just got done with my robotics class, and I'm about to head home.
Nice! What kind of robotics do you do?
I mostly work on self-driving cars. It's pretty cool stuff!
That sounds really interesting! I've always been fascinated by self-driving cars.
It's a lot of fun to work on. I get to use a lot of different software and hardware.
That's awesome! I'm glad you're enjoying it.
Thanks! I'm pretty passionate about it.
Well, it sounds like you're doing something really great with your life.
Thanks! I appreciate that.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but I mostly listen to electronic music.
Nice! I like electronic music too.
What are some of your favorite bands?
I like Daft Punk, Justice, and M83.
Cool! I like all of those bands.
What do you like about electronic music?
I like the way it makes me feel. It's very upbeat and energetic.
I agree. It's a great way to get pumped up.
Yeah! It's perfect for working out or going for a run.
I love working out to electronic music.
Me too!
Well, it was nice talking to you. Have a great day!
You too
